ing: 2 tablespoons any flavor of flavored syrup
des: "Use this basic recipe to make your favorite flavored latte with a home espresso machine."
ins: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Measure the flavored syrup into a large coffee mug.  Brew espresso, then add to mug.  Pour the steamed milk into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Spoon foam over the top.
